response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will bring significant benefits to your endeavors. Considering its true worth and the impact it can have on your business, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $950,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing the return on my investment and ensuring you receive a fair deal. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 950000}
